containerDefinitions.name: db-setup
command:
echo 'import asyncio, asyncpg, os
url = os.environ["DATABASE_URL"].replace("postgresql+asyncpg://", "postgresql://").replace("/nafs_health", "/postgres")
async def run():
    conn = await asyncpg.connect(url)
    print("Connected to postgres database")
    exists = await conn.fetchval("SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname = $1", "acucare_pathways")
    if exists:
        print("Database acucare_pathways already exists")
    else:
        await conn.execute("CREATE DATABASE acucare_pathways")
        print("Created database acucare_pathways")
    await conn.close()
    print("Done")
asyncio.run(run())' > /tmp/setup.py && python /tmp/setup.py
